Templates for MIADOC

This directory contains templates for writing MIADOC manuals in HTML.

NOTICE: A number of other thing, that used to be placed in this directory is now in the admin directory.

Templates

These can be used for starting points for manuals
  • frontpage.html
    is a suggestion for a manual frontpage.
  • template.html
    is an empty document with appropriate headers etc.
  • menupresentation.html
    is a suggestion on how to present menus in manuals
  • betapresentation.html
    is a suggestion on how to present BETA programs in manuals
  • dingbats.html
    lists various graphics buttons, icons etc. for use in the manuals.
  • inx.html
    suggested index layout.
